title: HOUR 3- Mychal Thompson Sep 25, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Mychal Thompson Sep 25, 2020
description:
Mychal Thompson tell Dan that he would like to see both the Lakers and the Nuggets stop looking to the refs for a bail out call. Mychal admits that if he and his son Clay were to play against the Curry's; that he and his son Clay would lose and it would be all his fault and that Clay would not speak to him for a week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Mychal Thompson tell Dan that he would like to see both the Lakers and the Nuggets stop looking to the refs for a bail out call. Mychal admits that if he and his son Clay were to play against the Curry's; that he and his son Clay would lose and it would be all his fault and that Clay would not speak to him for a week.
